content: do you love knitting but not the sewing up then this is the baby top for you so sweet - and no seaming required a lovely unisex design perfect for babies or baby dolls instructions for a wide range of sizes extra-small preemie small preemie medium preemie large preemie 0 - 3 months 6 months 9 months requirements dk 8ply yarn 4mm needles 4 5 or 6 small buttons a quick and easy knit **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
